div.h1: Important Information from SCS regarding COVID-19

span.span: School in Scott County will remain closed through Friday, May 1. We will continue NTI days during this extension.

p.span: April 15-17 will be set aside for students to catch up on their work and have any questions answered by their teachers. No new assignments will be posted or distributed for April 15, April 16, or April 17.

span.span: Meals will be distributed on Mondays, Tuesdays, and Thursdays from 10am-12pm. Available at the following locations:
Parents who need to enroll a student in any Scott County school

can print and complete a K-12 Enrollment Form. Scan and email the form to: becky.cooper@scott.kyschools.us along with a copy of the birth certificate, proof of residency, and any health forms completed at this time.
Also email Mrs. Cooper for information about early kindergarten screening.
For an archive of information distributed by Scott County Schools regarding COVID-19: https://www.scott.kyschools.us/News/covid19updates. Also available in Spanish.
